=How to embed and access resources=

==Steps to Embed resources:==
 # *Right click* on the file in the *Solution Explorer*
 # Select *Properties*
 # Change the *Build Action* to *Embedded Resource*
 
==Required References==
{{{
using System.IO;
using System.Reflection;
}}}

==Codes to access it==
 {{{
Assembly assembly;
assembly = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();
Stream s = assembly.GetManifestResourceStream("SyncButler.MRU.SyncedFile.xslt");
 }}}
